RateLimitingPolicy.TITLE: Rate Limiting Policy
RateLimitingPolicy.DESCRIPTION: Requests are limited to {{limit}} requests per {{timeUnit}}
RateLimitingPolicy.MORE_INFO: The following headers in the response contain useful information relating to rate limit:
RateLimitingPolicy.RESET: The time the rate limit will be reset

TransferQuotaPolicy.TITLE: Transfer Quota Policy
TransferQuotaPolicy.DESCRIPTION: You can transfer a maximum of {{limit}} of data per {{timeUnit}}
TransferQuotaPolicy.MORE_INFO: The following headers in the response contain useful information relating to quota limit:
TransferQuotaPolicy.RESET: The time the quota limit will be reset

DESCRIPTIONS.TRY_IT_OUT: Displays the Open API definition (Swagger) and allows for making test calls if the API is available.
DESCRIPTIONS.API_KEY:
When an API contract is created, the system generates a unique API Key.
This API Key is unique per client and the same for all contracts of this client.
All requests made to the API must include this API Key.
DESCRIPTIONS.API_ENDPOINT:
One important aspect of all APIs that are managed by the API Gateway is the security that the API Gateway provides.
The API can be accessed with this URL.

API.MORE_INFO: You will receive an email notification when there is progress in your client

ACCOUNT.TITLE: Thank you
ACCOUNT.SUBTITLE: Your account is awaiting approval
